Title: I Lost My Body
Writer: Jérémy Clapin (adaptation), Guillaume Laurant (adaptation), Guillaume Laurant (novel), Guillaume Laurant (adaptation), Guillaume Laurant (dialogue), Jérémy Clapin (adaptation), Jérémy Clapin (dialogue)
Actors: Hakim Faris, Victoire Du Bois, Patrick d'Assumçao, Alfonso Arfi
Plot: A story of Naoufel, a young man who is in love with Gabrielle. In another part of town, a severed hand escapes from a dissection lab, determined to find its body again.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 31 wins & 50 nominations.
